entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Runtime constants in attributes #108416
  • Experiencing SafeHandle disposed issue #108408
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'tree == stmt->GetRootNode()' #108406
    9.0.0
  • System.IO.Ports.Native termios c_iflag settings ignored? #108404
  • ARM64-SVE: Additions with GetActiveElementCount() should use incp #108400
  • [Mono Runtime] why is the garbage collector not doing its job? #108397
  • Starting many threaded processes breaks asynchronous read operations when using WaitForExit(int) #108395
  • ARM64-SVE: `TestFirstTrue()` can be optimised away when using `CreateTrueMask()` #108392
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ARM64 SVE: Add signed versions of the CreateWhileLessThanMask APIs #108384
  • RandomAccess.Write throws System.IO.IOException: Invalid argument when buffers count is greater than 1024 #108383
  • Backporting fixes to SmtpClient #108382
  • All file enumerations methods fail with System.IO.IOException: 'An unexpected network error occurred' when enumerating large network foler structures #108381
  • Test Failure: JIT/Methodical/cctor/xassem/xprecise1_cs_do/xprecise1_cs_do.cmd #108375

Closed

  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_11408/GitHub_11408/GitHub_11408.cmd #108361
    9.0.0
  • [QUIC] Alpine packaging #83789
    Future
  • .NET 9 Vector128.Min/Max performance regression #108168
  • ILC is hitting a NullReferenceException when processing linker XML from an assembly #108031
  • LibraryImport fails with 0xC0000005 code, but DllImport not #108399
  • "Enhanced precision" of DateTimeOffset Add methods results in incorrect value #108362
    Future
  • NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces does not work correctly on some iOS devices #106577
  • Creating a System.Net.Sockets.Socket on iOS17 devices is not reliable and can crash the runtime #106587
  • How to use proxy on Windows and Linux when PAC file is used #106933
  • Test failure: Assertion failed 'likelihood <= 1.0' #108100
    10.0.0
  • Is it possible to prompt for user certificate selection on iOS in the same way we can prompt on Android using KeyChain.ChooseX509Certificate2WithPrivateKeyAsync #108252
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: ValidationResult constructor with a single member name #108338
    Future
  • Uri.TryCreate Returns True For Uris That Are Not Absolute - Linux #108221
  • [wasm] LibraryTests_Threading test failure during assembly load #108394
    10.0.0
  • There is no good way to tell if a service is added when using Keyed Services #108346
  • Timeout at System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_LastWaits #106596
    10.0.0
  • JsonElement vs JsonDocument Parse: why no UseArrayPools #108157
  • Exporting Certificate with a password always chooses SHA1-3DES encryption #108330
  • Incorrect value provided by DirectoryInfo.Attributes when directory does not exist #108345
  • Support IDynamicInterfaceCastable with shared generic code #72909
    Future
  • Build dotnet cli on qnx? #32867

PullRequests

Created

  • [GC] Revert distribute_free_regions changes in preparation for different strategy #108417
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection code paths #108415
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Update stepping through MulticastDelegate under the Debugger #108414
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update field references in property accessors #108413
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/9.0][PERF] Backport python pipeline changes for performance tests #108412
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix wording around when objects are entering degraded gc mode #108411
    area-GC-mono
  • Fix flag assignment in pal_termios #108409
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Ports
  • Couple minor docs updates #108407
    area-Meta
  • [cdac] Implement NibbleMap lookup and tests #108403
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove pre-LSRA `fgRenumberBlocks` calls #108402
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [MonoVM] Improve thread state debugging and make it usable on Android #108401
    os-android, community-contribution, area-Threading-mono
  • Remove OverflowException for ReadCborNegativeIntegerRepresentation #108398
    area-System.Formats.Cbor
  • feat: makes GeneratedCodeAttribute constructor parameters optional #108393
    area-System.CodeDom, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Dispose Xunit ToolCommand - follow up #108387
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • RandomAccess.Write throws System.IO.IOException when buffers total size greater than 2GB #108380
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Allow devirt into abstract classes if we saw a non-abstract child #108379
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: remove some unnecessary DONT_REMOVE block flags #108405
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Updated tsaoptions.json to direct issues to runtime owners #108410
    area-Meta
  • Enable IDynamicInterfaceCastable tests disabled on fixed bug #108376
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [PERF] Pass ScenarioArgs for scenario performance tests #108303
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: use bbID for pred list ordering #108357
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fixing SetSlice, Reshape, TryCopyTo. #108282
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics.Tensors, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] break up cdacreader into 4 separate assemblies #108156
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Revert `Linux_arm` images to `ubuntu-16.04` #108396
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.36
  • Remove duplicate code in `DiagnosticsHandler` #108012
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add notifications for area-Interop-coreclr #108378
    area-Meta
  • Move computation of `DebuggerAssemblyControlFlags` from `DomainAssembly` to `Assembly` #107809
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Root the System.Runtime EventSource #108348
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • Fix IDynamicInterfaceCastable with shared generic code #108235
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Dispose Xunit ToolCommand #108319
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Modify several atomic instructions in nativeaot. #108377
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64

Updated

  • Add experimental Swift bindings for CryptoKit #108318
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 10.0.0
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Update `field` references in property accessors #108222
    area-Meta
  • Share pthread_setname via minipal #108370
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] fix guid version > 7 #108351
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime
  • Vectorize codegen for left shift operator on byte vector #108336
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Support for devirtualizing array interface methods #108153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fixed dependency injection event source tests randomly failing. #107465
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Remove BinaryReader and BinaryWriter references from ZipArchive #103153
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fix resolving types with primary constructors using in parameters #105928
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Move TLS tests to unsupported list #107236
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add comments to host error_codes.h #107775
    area-Host
  • Test NuGet bug fix #108337
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/9.0] Enable policheck and tsa #108340
    area-Meta
  • Rename SourceBuildUseMonoRuntime property, which is not SB specific #108145
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Allow to build browser in library mode #106388
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, linkable-framework, os-browser
  • Trying to support changing member accessibility #108350
    area-EnC-mono
  • Add runtime check for unwind get_proc_info_in_range #108250
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add 3-opt implementation for improving upon RPO-based layout #103450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Compile the minipal as an object and static library #107889
    area-Infrastructure
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Fold some casts early in importer #108356
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix partial compilation for CETCOMPAT mode #108062
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Networking stress tests infrastructure improvements. #108325
    area-System.Net
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2549582 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Set unwind table kind #107462
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Bugfix InvalidOperationException/IndexOutOfRangeException in HttpListener.EndGetContext #107804
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] fix the building error for "PalInterlockedCompareExchange128" #108364
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Add Support for Vector512 in BinaryPrimitives.ReverseEndianness (#108204) #108205
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Add sampling profiler #108083
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix handling of appending keywords to boolean schemas. #108248
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-30
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [Swift Bindings] Added demangling support for protocol conformance descriptors and nested type names #2694
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge to Sep 24 #2688

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Document an exhaustive list of packages shipped in or used by a given version of the .NET SDK #43800
  • Document recommended behaviors/configurations for users that use Package Lock Files with the .NET SDK #43799
  • In Debian ARM64, `dotnet test` does not work #43790

Closed

  • Flexibility of installation on Linux is more trouble than it is worth. #36046
  • How to make `dotnet run` invoke an MSBuild target? #31253
    9.0.1xx
  • Getting System.NullReferenceException when running `dotnet tool update -g --all` #42598
  • Transitive project references missing aliases #2454
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable baseline manifest generation #43797
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fix roslyn issues with non-official version builds #43796
    untriaged
  • Allow for older Windows SDK projection packages without profiles to build on .NET 9 #43795
    untriaged, Area-WindowsSDK
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers prerequisites #43794
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Always disable NuGet auditing in source-only build #43696
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve logging from agent #43672
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #43791
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix NullReferenceException for `dotnet tool update -g --all` #43157
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Merge the net10 runtime, aspnetcore, windowsdesktop, and arcade codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix typos #43730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix port when fall back to http #43620
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2549754 #43514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix baseline manifest version for RTM branding #43737
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers #43085
    Area-Containers
  • Add Lock comments for Windows setup #43699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Issues

Updated

  • Primary Constructors (VS 17.6, .NET 8) #2691

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VerifyPdb helper doesn't include information about usings into XML used to verify baselines for portable format. #75300
  • `MSBuildWorkspace.OpenSolutionAsync(..)` fails with "[BuildHost PID 3328] The BuildHost process exited with -1. Process output:" #75292
  • Diagnostic suppressor seems to work only for open files #75291

Closed

  • IReadOnlyList/IReadOnlySet Collection Expression Parity #75308
  • Feature 'Edit and Continue' currently unavailable due to an internal error. Read out of bounds. #65176
    Backlog
  • IDE0028/IDE0090/IDE00300/IDE0305 do not catch some expressions #72699
    Backlog
  • Call sites of a type marked with `[CreateNewOnMetadataUpdate]` don't use the updated type on metadata updates #70604
  • Assert failure when building runtime: Synthesized attribute constructor missing #75032
    17.12
  • Variables captured in a lambda and in a local function are getting different treatment in DefiniteAssignmentPass #66557
    Backlog
  • "IDE0018 Variable declaration can be inlined" missing in top-level statements #74736
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix crash with Dispose method with params #75305
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve error reporting when reading bad metadata during EnC #75304
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • PR feedback on "use collection expression". #75303
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fixes comparison of VB XML literals #75301
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix interactive window pull diags #75298
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update insertion model after VS snap #75295
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Report error for native PDB limit #75293
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix the path to the proposal #75302
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Switch caching file comparer to a threadstatic storage to prevent locks #75297
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix TSA tooling #75307
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Clarify the bug template to request a code snippet #75306
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Bump razor for serialization changes #75282
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75299
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Detect more fluent cases for converting collection expressions #75267
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Disallow declaration of indexers in absence of proper DefaultMemberAttribute. #75099
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75277
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Collapse the rename UI when commit starts #75213
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • don't mess with user caret in smart rename #75294
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2548898 #75274
    auto-merge
  • Move Quick Info content production to the Features layer and add Razor EA co-hosting APIs for Hover and Completion #75226
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add support for inlining declarations in top level code #75258
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix `NETCOREAPP3_0_OR_GREATER` in `SegmentedArrayHelper` #74687
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update LanguageServer references #75290
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Reapply "Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process" #75233
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode
  • Use manual recursion for binary patterns #75212
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve doc comments for `IConditionalOperation.IsRef` #75288
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when inferring unique method signature #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • EditorConfig comments cannot follow a property value #51625
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config, VSCode
  • Support long chains of `else if` statements #74317
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix symbol info in identifier name in object initializer #74582
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • WIP: Fix issue simplifying name in speculative context #75255
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #75180
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Convert more lambda rude edits to runtime rude edits #75285
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Change rename command handler's behavior #75229
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Avoid unnecessary tail increment in collection expressions codegen #74982
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13
  • Fix null coalescing operator emit with span conversion #75103
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider flagging ListenOptions.Listen(IPAddress.Any) #58172
  • Retry ConnectionClosedWhenResponseDoesNotSatisfyMinimumDataRate #58169
  • IApiRequestMetadataProvider not respected and still add application/*+json content type. #58166
  • Inferred response body for 4xx response in MinimalAPI app is "TaskOfTodo" #58165
  • Response cache middleware corrupts data #58164
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes, updates #58162
  • Make fields in logs of Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting consistent #58160
  • Debugging Blazor Server running in a dev container (WSL) #58151
    .NET 10 Planning

Closed

  • Add Get and GetOrdered to EndpointMetadataCollection #58110
  • Perf improvement: mvc, plaintext #58113
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #58149
  • [Blazor]When using the SSR mode, OnAfterRenderAsync is not called? #58150
  • Blazor SSR with NTLM Authentication no longer works on iOS 18 or iPadOs 18 #57918
    9.0.0
  • SignalR input binding fails to parse Authorization header #58148
  • Perf improvement: json_spring, multiple_queries #58141

PullRequests

Created

  • Add note about perf to Http3SampleApp #58171
    area-networking
  • Retry ConnectionClosedWhenResponseDoesNotSatisfyMinimumDataRate test #58170
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixed to not throw an exception when password is null. #58168
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Run static code analysis on IIS #58167
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Update Selenium package version #58163
    area-infrastructure
  • Implement the Mvc PushFileStreamResult API #58161
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-rtm.24479.2 #58153
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Quarantine CheckStdoutWithLargeWrites_LogFile #58109
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Re-quarantine OrderedGroupMetadataForControllers #58105
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Unquarantine fixed tests that have not failed in 30 days #57978
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet-counters long value rendered format #4415

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Get System.ArgumentException error when exiting net 8 or 9 mobile windows app that used border.shadow #25014
  • Leak caused by activity indicator. #25012
  • CollectionView throws java.lang.IllegalStateException on Android when using RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand #25010
  • PushAsync hangs if app is running in the background #25009
  • ContentPage Property InputTransparent = true, causes blank page #25007
  • CollectionView with Entry starts to endless scrolling with HorizontalTextAlignment="End" or HorizontalTextAlignment="Center". #25005
  • [MAUI]Go to 'My Recipes' page throw exception"Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory " #25002
  • Memory leak in animations #25001
  • Changing Translation of an element causes Maui in iOS to constantly run Measure & ArrangeChildren (likely cause of brutal iOS Layout performance issues) #24996
  • "System.InvalidOperationException" exception occurs when closing the Blazer+Winform application #24995

Closed

  • NullReferenceException with a platform-specific GestureRecognizer #24900
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Unable to debug MAUI android source code as it contains the bug because VS 2022 cannot find source symbol files #22577
  • Black Screen when resuming iOS App when debugging #24793
  • ILLINK errors when compiling MAUI apps on Mac - says targeting version that I'm not #24981
  • Cannot using the control of CommunityToolkit.WinUI.Controls.Primitives #24982
  • App crashes on launch during Apple App Review (iOS 18.0 - iPad Air 5th Generation) #24805
    9.0-rc2
  • [Android] Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException: 'No view found for id 0x7f0900fd (com.twe.elon:id/labeled) for fragment NavigationRootManager_ElementBasedFragment{e99ccf3} (d735450b-8b7e-4e10-87d0-3b9a8251e4b3 id=0x7f0900fd)' #24774
    9.0-rc2
  • Unable to set flyout burger menu icon color in Shell when customized with FontImageSource #24857
  • iOS crash with TestFlight, UseInterpreter no longer working properly with latest .NET8 #24836
    9.0-rc2
  • I cannot select API Level 35 for Android. #24813
    9.0-rc2
  • Asp.net core #24853

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0] Move to rtm #25017
  • Remove excessive Picker API comment #25016
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update the Benchmarks.Droid app to use built in Android GetExternalFilesDir #25015
    community ✨
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    community ✨
  • Fixed Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.90 (Latest stable) Ruins Entry Controls #25006
    community ✨
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    community ✨
  • Fixed Size not calculated properly when invoking UseMauiCompatibility method in MauiProgram #25003
    community ✨
  • Fixed NavigationPage TitleBar visibility issue when set to the parent page #25000
    community ✨
  • Fixed Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24999
    community ✨
  • (Re)enable Mail API for Mac Catalyst #24998
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-essentials
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Update rc2 internal #25013
  • [C] avoid NRE on null GestureRecognizer #25008
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20240925231640755 to net9.0 #24935
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24953
    9.0-rc2

Updated

  • Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers (attempt 2) #24952
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • Revert #24222 and simply use `invalidate` instead of `postInvalidate` #24990
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • [iOS] Text alignment in editor - improvements #24859
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
    area-controls-image
  • Fix disabled WebView Cookie Tests #24978
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • [Windows] Skip initial assignments in property mapper (take 3) #23987
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-core-platform
  • CollectionView Header/Footer/EmptyView issues when adding/removing items. #24830
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨
  • Fix for Windows SearchBar MaxLength > 0 not working properly. #24919
    community ✨
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Getting exception "The multi-part identifier could not be bound." when using GroupBy ,Contains and OrderBy #34801
  • Application crash when locking `compilationLock` in `RelationalCommandCache.cs` #34796
  • Add support for ComplexProperty fields in alternate key configurations #34794
  • EF Core fails to execute simple LINQ to SQL #34792
  • Modelbuilder.Model.GetEntityTypes() does not return mapped type T if there is not DbSet<T> defined in the context class #34791
  • Extensibility for getting the default column value for a type mapping (for adding non-nullable columns) #34790
